column4: hey all Im scared like shit, i installed gftp and all my files hust gone, they disappeared!!!!!
gftp is a ftp client (not a server). if they are gone then you deleted them yourself
yep, very. But i don't like the default Rodent icons at all. look like a three year old made them :-) Appart from that....
some gnome apps may not work. if you have the space it is easier just to leave it on the machine.
